entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [.NET9] Look at fixing the order that we process OnChildAdded as it relates to the handlers #23409
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Scrolling on a List View causes massive memory leak #23406
    Backlog
  • [net9.0] Controls DeviceTests hang #23403
    .NET 8 SR8
  • CollectionView Selection Issue on Android #23402
  • Android crashes on Modal Animation when backgrounded #23399
  • FilePicker FileTypes filtering does not work for *.msg files on Android #23398
  • Resizetizer file access issues on Windows build in Visual Studio #23397
  • Android - NullReferenceException thrown from ItemContentView #23394
  • [MAUI] I5_ EmptyView -It is almost impossible to see what is typed in the Filter search box. #23392
  • IImage does not take into account photo Orientation, causing IImage height and width to get mixed up #23391
  • Blazor Hybrid not working on MacOS 15.0 [Potential fix] #23390
  • Maui receive event of EASessionController is lower than Xamarin. #23388
  • CollectionView Footer - Deleting Items From the Collectionview hides the Content Of The Footer #23387

Closed

  • Method "OnAppearing" for ContentPage not called after application is resumed #23401
  • [MAUI][.NET9] Clicking on any recipe page shows blank #21032
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Regression] CarouselView with Loop="False" containing ScrollView does not resize to reveal newly visible items #13188
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Save File #23389
  • DisplayActionSheet crashes on MacCatalyst #23288
  • mini_init_method_rgctx + 1673 (jit-icalls.c:1673) #18424
  • Cannot publish Windows app package due to sign tool error #22985
  • Cannot load images on MAUI app #22839
  • Reenable Windows UI Tests AND make Android UI tests work #21617
    Backlog
  • File is not a database on iphone xr #23279
    Backlog
  • CollectionView Layout breaks if IsVisible starts as False #18395
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • If PlatformView has been removed use index #23408
  • `Element`: NRE by accessing `RealParent` - fix #23405
    community ✨
  • [net9] Bring changes from p6 release branch back into net9.0 #23404
  • [android]: ModalContainer Destroy commit allowing state loss #23400
    community ✨
  • [Binding SG] Dogfood binding source generator in the MAUI codebase #23393

Merged

  • [windows] fix memory leak in `TabbedPage` #23281
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-tabbedpage, memory-leak 💦
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-templates
  • [Binding SG] Split bindings source generated code into multiple files #23116
    area-xaml

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Fixed scroll to group item on Android + Windows #16704
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, stale, Under Consideration
  • Run UI tests per groups of categories in CI #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • [tests] Analyzer / code fix provider for UITest [Test] without [Category] #23287
    area-infrastructure, area-testing
  • [windows] fix memory leak in `MauiWinUIWindow` #23327
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, memory-leak 💦
  • [Windows] Fix memory leak with GroupedItemTemplateCollection #23386
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Set device tests to release mode and export logs before device is deleted #23334
    area-infrastructure
  • Cross TabBar navigation broken on iOS - Fix #22655
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Crash upon resuming the app - fix #23360
    area-core-lifecycle, platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, community ✨, migration-compatibility
  • Adopt chromium methodology for determining tablet on Windows #22809
    community ✨, area-controls-window
  • [Windows] Respect `ClearButtonVisibility = ClearButtonVisibility.Never` for `<Entry>`s #23158
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] TabbedPage in FlyoutPage in navigationPage does not fit all screen #22836
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
